Hyundai vs Maruti: Creta blows a solid punch in May ...  (ex-showroom). The 2020 Hyundai Creta is powered by new BS6 compliant engines- a 1.5-litre petrol, a 1.5-litre diesel and 1.4-litre turbo petrol engine. The 2020 Hyundai Creta is available in five variants- E, EX, S, SX, and SX(O), ranging from Rs. 9.99 lakh to Rs. 17.2 lakh (ex-showroom India). Creta takes on the likes of Kia Seltos , Nissan Kicks and Renault Captur . Due to Creta's aggresive pricing, it also faces competition from the likes of Tata Harrier and MG Hector .
